events.name: Original events from the platformer template, we haven't changed anything here

events.comment: Change the animation according to what the player do.
events.comment2: On change l'animation en fonction de ce que fait le joueur.

events.comment: Make sure the camera follows the player.
events.comment2: On s'assure que la caméra suit le joueur.

events.comment: Include external event to allow double jump either from the floor or the ladder

events.comment2: Gestion des collisions avec le joueur:

events.comment: Initialize a variable to store how many times the player jumped

If player is jumping OR falling AND the value of jumpCount is less than 2, so the player did not jumped twice then allow again jumping if the space key is pressed and also increase the value of jumpCount so we know how many times the player jumped
If you want to allow the player to jump say 3 times, then change the value from 2 to 3
If the player is on the floor OR on the ladder, set the variable jumpCount back to 0 so we can double jump again
